name: SUPER MONSTER JAM
description:
Super Monster Jam is a high octane top down shooter all about fast paced action, ruthless challenges and decapitating the Undead.

Set in a city torn apart by a bio hazard outbreak, your mission is to infiltrate the city,Exterminate the Undead and destroy the machine that caused the outbreak.

Inspired by Hotline Miami, Zombies ate my neighbours and Monster party, We have created a fun, unique and challenging game that will test even seasoned gamer's skills.

TRY THE DEMO!
